document_data.name: Haku
document_data.mainbody: '''Haku''' was a [[yakuza]] assassin in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Haku used a [[chain]] and [[dagger|knife]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], Haku was ordered to kill [[Toshikazu Wada]], the commander of the city [[Home Guard]]. Waiting for the right time to scratch Toshikazu Wada with a poisoned needle, Haku observed Wada during a meeting with an adventuring party hired by the [[daimyo]] [[Benju Matsutomo]].
